watch_short_description: Analog Watch  - For Men Combo Pack Of 2 New Arrival Black & Brown
watch_detail:
Product Details
            









                Display Type
               

                Analog
               



                Style Code
               

                Combo Pack Of 2 New Arrival Black & Brown
               



                Occasion
               

                Casual
               



                Watch Type
               

                Wrist Watch
               



                Pack of
               

                2
               



                Sales Package
               

                2 Watch
               



                Mechanism
               

                Quartz
               



                Strap Color
               

                Black, Brown
               



                Net Quantity
               

                2
               



                Strap Material
               

                Synthetic Leather Strap
               



                Strap Type
               

                Stitched
               



                Case/Bezel Material
               

                Stainless steel
               



                Power Source
               

                Battery Powered
               



                Box Material
               

                Paper
               



                Dial Color
               

                Black, Silver
               



                Domestic Warranty
               

                6 Months
               



                Warranty Service Type
               

                Off Site Warranty - Customer will Need to send the Defected Product to Our Warehouse and the replaced Product will be sent back to customer.
               



                Warranty Period
               

                6 Months
               


               This Analog Watches comes with a Designer Look dial and stainless steel back. The dial is protected by a mineral glass and has a Designer strap for added comfort with Precious Finishing. The time is controlled by a single crown on the side of the watc
              

               Manufacturing, Packaging and Import Info
              


              Read More
